summary: This document is an email exchange regarding the submission of a supervisor memorandum about an incident involving inmate Jeffrey Epstein that occurred on August 10, 2019, at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. The sender is reminding the recipient to submit the report, while the recipient claims to have been properly relieved prior to the incident.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as the inmate involved in an incident at the Metropolitan Correctional Center on August 10, 2019.

events.title: Epstein Incident at MCC
events.description: An incident involving inmate Jeffrey Epstein occurred at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: Memorandum Submission Deadline
events.description: Deadline for submitting a supervisor memorandum regarding the Epstein incident.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, NY
keyFacts: An incident involving Jeffrey Epstein occurred at the Metropolitan Correctional Center on August 10, 2019.
A supervisor memorandum regarding the incident was required to be submitted by August 13, 2019.
The email exchange suggests internal procedural follow-up regarding the Epstein incident shortly before his death.
